00001 /*  
00002  * File: EqnSelectorYoung.h 
00003  * ------------------------ 
00004  * Header file for EqnSelectorYoung class, which is for Young's type variables
00005  * p, Den_c, Den_w, Sg, Xcg
00006  * Connection terms are implemented in EqnSelectorYoung2PConnImp(2P) or EqnSelectorYoungMPConnImp(MP)
00007  * ------------------------------------------  
00008  * Created      01/31/99        Huic  
00009  * Modified by HPan in Feb. 2006 for separation of connection implementation
00010  * 
00011  */  
00012 
00013 #ifndef EQNSELECTORYOUNG_H_ 
00014 #define EQNSELECTORYOUNG_H_ 
00015 #include "EqnSelector.h"
00016 #include "../fluid/HCPhase.h"
00017 #include "../fluid/CompFluid.h"
00018 
00019 class Facilities;
00020 
00021 class EqnSelectorYoung : public EqnSelector { 
00022 public: 
00023         EqnSelectorYoung(DataPool *dataPool, Facilities *pFac, CompFluid *Compfluid); 
00024         virtual ~EqnSelectorYoung(); 
00025 
00026         virtual void registerData();    // register data from datapool
00027 
00028         //define the friend class
00029         friend class EqnSelectorYoung2PConnImp;
00030         friend class EqnSelectorYoungMPConnImp;
00031 
00032 protected:
00033         virtual void updateBaseVars();  // update the base variables if necessary
00034 
00035 private:
00036         // --- read only data ---
00037         const double *mPres, *mSat, *mXcp;                              // pressure, saturation and mole fraction
00038         const double *mDens, *mDDens_Dp, *mDDens_Dxi;   // phase density and their derivatives
00039         const double *mVol, *mPoro, *mTemp;                             // cell volume, porosity and temperature
00040         const double *mCompMass;                                // component mass
00041         
00042         // --- self data ----
00043         double *mTT;            // the transformation matrix for each block 
00044         double *den_c, den_w, sg, so, sw, *xcg, *xco, *wco;
00045         HCPhase **mHCPhases;    // pointer to HC phases
00046 
00047         void createData();      // create data
00048         void updateTT();        // calculate mTT, and do inverse for it
00049 
00050         void solveForXco(int ib);     // a helper method
00051 };
